savedQuery.name: Total bytes going to a domain
savedQuery.query: SELECT event.http.hostname AS domain, SUM(event.netflow.bytes) AS total_bytes FROM {table_name} WHERE event.http.hostname IS NOT NULL GROUP BY event.http.hostname ORDER BY total_bytes DESC;

attributes.title: Total bytes going to a domain

savedQuery.name: Total number of blocks per Amazon managed rule group
savedQuery.query: SELECT event.alert.signature AS rule_group_name, COUNT(*) AS total_blocks FROM {table_name} WHERE event.alert.action = 'blocked' AND event.alert.signature IS NOT NULL GROUP BY event.alert.signature ORDER BY total_blocks DESC;

attributes.title: Total number of blocks per Amazon managed rule group

savedQuery.name: Total number of bytes blocked per Amazon managed rule group
savedQuery.query: SELECT event.alert.signature AS managed_rule, event.alert.signature_id AS rule_id, SUM(event.netflow.bytes) AS total_bytes_blocked FROM {table_name} WHERE event.alert.action = 'blocked' GROUP BY event.alert.signature, event.alert.signature_id ORDER BY total_bytes_blocked DESC;

attributes.title: Total number of bytes blocked per Amazon managed rule group
